tp:treatment-sec.p:
Forest, e.g.,
Alnus
,
Castanea
,
Quercus
,
Corylus
,
Populus
; from 193–800 m a.s.l.

The lack of males from the northern part of the distribution area of this species was interpreted by Verhoeff (1921) as “klimatisch-geographisches Parthenogenese”. This seems to have been the first time that the phenomenon “geographical parthenogenesis” was recognized (see Enghoff 1994 ).
